hero_title: The product security management platform designed by experts.
hero_body: ARIANNA helps device manufacturers identify, triage, address, and report vulnerabilities across hardware and software components. Build SBOMs and HBOMs, automate monitoring, and show compliance to global regulations from a single, elegant workspace.
platform_title: Device manufacturers rely on ARIANNA to keep products secure and prove compliance.
platform_subtitle: Designed around a robust vulnerability management process for connected devices and systems.
platform_card1_body: Automate vulnerability tracking and prioritize fixes using enriched exploit intelligence and contextual risk scoring.
platform_card2_body: Generate SBOM, HBOM, and VEX reports that align with major regulations including RED DA, FDA, and CRA.
platform_card3_body: Build complete device models from software and hardware artifacts to close gaps between engineering and compliance.
features_subtitle: Your complete solution for SBOM, HBOM, and vulnerability management.
feature1_body: Maintain accurate software component inventories with automated updates through APIs or the ARIANNA workspace.
feature2_body: Monitor hardware components with the same rigor as software to deliver end-to-end product security.
feature3_body: Reduce false positives, auto-close patched vulnerabilities, and scan global databases daily.
feature4_body: Assign owners, track deadlines, and export audit-ready reports for every vulnerability lifecycle step.
feature5_body: Prioritize based on KEV, exploit maturity, attack vector, severity, and risk across your fleet.
feature6_body: Map internal and external requirements to enforce SLAs and stay ahead of compliance deadlines.
coverage_title: Extensive support for all major languages, ecosystems, and build platforms.
coverage_body: ARIANNA analyzes build artifacts to provide a complete device model, combining software and hardware bills of materials with precise vulnerability mapping.
coverage_quote: Connected device teams face fast-moving regulations and complex security challenges. ARIANNA simplifies the labyrinth with a unified, expert-built platform that keeps cybersecurity and compliance in lockstep.
demo_title: Schedule a free demo or trial
demo_body: Discover how ARIANNA helps device manufacturers secure embedded products throughout the product lifecycle. We will tailor the demo to your device stack and compliance requirements.
